data.name: A build-in oracle system enabling smart contracts to access external resources.
data.value: 内置的预言机系统，使智能合约能够访问外部资源

data.name: A consensus algorithm with high stability, high TPS and single block finality.
data.value: 一种具有高稳定性、高 TPS 和单区块终局性的共识算法

data.name: A distributed data storage system for storing large-scale data on the chain.
data.value: 一种分布式数据存储系统，用于在链上存储大规模数据

data.name: A dual-token mechanism for splitting the governance and use rights of the Neo network to facilitate the management and liquidity.
data.value: 一种用于分离 Neo 的网络治理和使用权的双通证机制，增强通证的管理与流动性

data.name: A lightweight, cross-platform and scalable virtual machine.
data.value: 一种轻量级、可跨平台、具备高扩展性的虚拟机

data.name: A smart contract system with support for multiple languages, cross-platform compatibility and parallel execution.
data.value: 一个支持多种常见编程语言、可跨平台、可并行执行的智能合约系统

data.name: About
data.value: 关于我们

data.name: An Open Network for Smart Economy
data.value: 专为智能经济打造的开放网络

data.name: Apply
data.value: 立即申请

data.name: Explorer
data.value: 了解更多

data.name: How To Become A Consensus Node
data.value: 如何成为共识节点

data.name: https://neo-ngd.github.io/reference/How-To-Become-NEO-Consensus-Node.html
data.value: https://neo-ngd.github.io/reference/%E5%A6%82%E4%BD%95%E6%88%90%E4%B8%BANEO%E5%85%B1%E8%AF%86%E8%8A%82%E7%82%B9.html

data.name: Learn more
data.value: 了解更多

data.name: More details:
data.value: 更多详细信息：

data.name: Neo Contributors
data.value: Neo 贡献者

data.name: Neo Governance
data.value: 成为共识节点，与我们同塑未来

data.name: Neo has developed an infrastructure with features to optimize stability and performance, including a smart contract system compatible with commonly used programming languages and solutions for transactional finality. Neo is successfully driving innovations which are paving the way for large-scale commercial applications, including a data storage system capable of hosting large volumes of data while ensuring security and privacy.
data.value: Neo 所开发的基础设施兼顾高性能与稳定性，不但支持开发者使用多种常用编程语言进行智能合约开发，还提供确保交易终局性解决方案。Neo 正在成功推进各项创新，包括一个具备高安全性和隐私性的大规模数据存储系统，为区块链技术的大规模商业应用落地铺平道路。

data.name: Neo in Retrospect
data.value: Neo 大事记

data.name: Neo is an open-source, community driven initiative that is leveraging upon blockchain technology's intrinsic advantages to explore and realize optimized and future-designed solutions for a digital world.
data.value: 作为一个由社区驱动的开源项目，Neo 正利用区块链技术的固有优势，探索并实现面向未来数字世界的最优化解决方案。

data.name: Off-chain governance: Candidates can establish a partnership with the Neo Foundation to receive the latter’s vote.
data.value: 链下治理：候选人将与 Neo 基金会建立战略伙伴关系，并接受来自基金会的投票。

data.name: On-chain governance: Candidates can become a consensus nodes after being voted in by NEO holders.
data.value: 链上治理：候选人通过获得 NEO 持有者的投票，被选举成为共识节点

data.name: On-chain voting mechanism allowing everyone to participate in the network governance.
data.value: 允许每个人都参与网络治理的链上投票机制

data.name: Returns data sovereignty back to the user , transforms "trust or not" into "how much trust" , allows users to customize trust evaluation models flexibly.
data.value: 让用户重新拥有数据主权，通过新提出的信用评分机制将“信任与否”的难题转换为“信任多少”的判断，用户还可以灵活定制适合自己的信任评估模型。

data.name: Technology
data.value: 技术优势
